Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: NOT_PROVIDED

.. py:class:: FieldCacheMixin

   Provide an API for working with the model's fields value cache.


   .. py:method:: get_cache_name()
      :abstractmethod:



   .. py:method:: get_cached_value(instance, default=NOT_PROVIDED)


   .. py:method:: is_cached(instance)


   .. py:method:: set_cached_value(instance, value)


   .. py:method:: delete_cached_value(instance)


.. py:class:: CheckFieldDefaultMixin

   .. py:method:: check(**kwargs)
